# G-Thangs: Causal Inference with R

## About Our Presenter

Travis Gerke, ScD, is Director of Data Science at the PCCTC, a contract research organization that facilitates clinical trials and real-world evidence studies in oncology. He is also co-founder of cStructure, a technology company that provides a collaborative platform for causal design and inference.
